name: Workshop Master
description: Skilled craftsman who commissions equipment and offers workshop contracts.
personality: Practical and detail-oriented, values quality work and proper tools.

name: Market Trader
description: Experienced merchant who buys and sells trade goods, offers delivery contracts.
personality: Business-focused and opportunistic, always looking for profitable deals.

name: Tavern Keeper
description: Friendly innkeeper who offers room rentals and simple labor contracts. Hears all the local gossip.
personality: Hospitable and well-informed, knows local gossip and travel conditions.

name: Guard Captain
description: Veteran soldier who maintains order and offers escort contracts.
personality: Disciplined and protective, values law and order.

name: Librarian
description: Learned scholar who manages books and offers research contracts.
personality: Intellectual and curious, values knowledge and learning.

name: Smith
description: Expert blacksmith who repairs equipment and forges tools.
personality: Strong and reliable, takes pride in quality work.

name: Forest Trader
description: Trader specializing in forest goods and rare herbs.
personality: Knowledgeable about forest resources, fair in dealings.

name: Lodge Keeper
description: Runs the forest lodge, provides shelter and local information.
personality: Warm and protective, knows the forest well.

name: Bridge Captain
description: Commands the bridge garrison and manages river crossings.
personality: Strategic and watchful, ensures safe passage.

name: Archive Keeper
description: Maintains historical records and offers document services.
